text: akave, irantu natkalil avarrai elu vanankalaka avan erpatuttinan ovvoru vanattirkum atarkuriya katamai innatena arivittan innum, ulakattirku camipamana vanattai nam vilakkukalaik kontu alankarittom innum atanaip patukappakavum akkinom itu yavaraiyum mikaittavanum, nanam mikkonumakiya (irai)vanutaiya erpateyakum
